title: Tragedy of the Commons - ocean oil pollution

content.question: Which of the following is the best example of the tragedy of the commons?

choices.label: Water pollution from oil rigs concentrated in the Gulf of Mexico
An increase in the concentration of a toxin as it goes through the food chain
Exponential population growth as a country goes through the demographic transition
The use of invasive species as a biological control
The overharvesting of fish from privately owned lakes

content.answer: Water pollution from oil rigs concentrated in the Gulf of Mexico
